ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.adapters

Class AnswerListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseExpandableListAdapter
      • ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.adapters.AnswerListAdapter

  • public class AnswerListAdapter
extends BaseExpandableListAdapter
    The Class AnswerListAdapter. Connects a list of answers to the QAView. Handles favoriting & adding to the reading list - Not yet implemented. Handles calling the WriteReplyDialogFragment to be displayed
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    group 10
